WELCOME.HELP: This tool will allow you to check your IRC ATM card balance for free.
WELCOME.NOTE_1: Note: the information is updated on business days only.
WELCOME.NOTE_2: Check below for when this information was last updated.

INPUT.CARD_NO: Enter your last five digits from the card
INPUT.VALIDATION_ERROR: Phone and card number does not match.

RESULTS.NOTE_1: Note: Greek ATMs give out euros only. Your balance is displayed in USD.
RESULTS.NOTE_2: A bank exchange rate will be applied when you withdraw euros from an ATM. You will be charged a 5 Euro fee for each ATM withdrawal, plus a foreign-exchange fee of around 2 percent of your withdrawal.
RESULTS.NOTE_3: Balance retrieved on {{date}} at {{time}}. For more accuracy please visit
RESULTS.ERROR: Looks like you came here from bad link. Click the button below to go to the card form.
